review: It was ok product but did not find to much use for it, was resold back to another person.
author: Edgar Estrella

review: Arrived on time.  Easy to setup; met my expectations.  I love it
author: Eugene A. Iannacone

review: This is great. You can cast anyting from your computer, phone or tablet right onto your tv. Does not matter if you have different brands of devices. This product is cool and useful. Was not sure at first but once I figured it out and started using it, now I'm going to give these as gifts this year for Christmas. Great price. This product came within 2 days and very well packaged.
author: Chris Heitman

review: Having used a Roku streaming stick for a little while, I decided to purchase the chromecast as well, and see how it is. While similar, the 2 devices do have differences to them. The chromecast requires another device to stream media from, such as your phone or computer, but it is quite handy to be able to play youtube videos from your phone to the television with.
author: Lance LeDuc "Whovian"

review: Great product. I can view videos online on a much bigger screen.
author: RONALDA ANN BLACKWOOD
